# Course Description

In this course, we cover the basics of visualization, data munging, and basic statistics using the [tidyverse in R](http://tidyverse.org). It is freely available to everyone and runs off the [Binder cloud service](http://mybinder.org). Written with [Jessica Minnier](http://jessicaminnier.com/).
